title: A Broken Authority (Part 2)
body:
A Broken Authority (Part 2)

Evan didn't summon all of his Shadow Undeads. Instead, he only summoned his main Shadow Undeads, like Eclipse, Elysia, Nekros, Hana, Snow, Aqua, Volac, Gobu, Kazil, Albelu and a few others.

"You guys can speak now, right?" Evan asked, looking at Albelu, Snow, Aqua and a few other of his shadow undeads who couldn't speak before.

""Yes Master""

All of his shadow undeads spoke at the same time, sounding quite excited.

Evan's lips arched upwards when he saw that Snow and his other shadow undeads could now speak without any problem.

Evan first noticed that his shadow undeads could now speak when he ordered them to attack Ashley.

At that time, Nekros shouted something like SMASH while swinging his fist towards Ashley. Although he was killed by Ashley with a wave of her hand, Evan was still surprised because before becoming Rank One Core Evolver Nekros couldn't speak.
